{"id":1522642111,"question_id":3620,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 week, 3 days","timestamp":1738018374,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"125 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1522642111/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Maximum Number of Distinct Elements After Operations","memory":"97.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int maxDistinctElements(vector<int>& nums, int k) {\n        //Add an integer in the range [-k, k] to the element.\n        int ans = 0;\n        sort(nums.begin(), nums.end());\n        int last = INT_MIN;\n        //Simply try to update each number with its lowes possible vlaue and keep counting if we can assign a different number to it.\n        for(int i=0; i<nums.size(); i++) {\n            int mn = nums[i]-k;\n            int mx = nums[i]+k;\n            if(last < mn) {\n                last = mn;\n                ans++;\n            } else if( last < mx) {\n                last = last+1;\n                ans++;\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"maximum-number-of-distinct-elements-after-operations","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
